    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    LogIn
    Controller class for handling login and password recovery in the application.
    Main
    The entry point of the Quirx JavaFX application.
    MenuController
    Controller for the main menu of the application.
    MyProfileController
    Controller class for handling the user's profile and password visibility toggle.
    SignUp
    Controller class for the Sign-Up screen.
    Task
    Represents a task in the Quirx task management system.
    Task.Priority
    Represents the priority of a task, with a display name and associated CSS style class.
    Task.Status
    Represents the status of a task, with a display name and associated CSS style class.
    WorkspaceController
    Controller for the workspace interface of the Quirx application.
